snippet: There are so many model ships, vintage photographs and life preservers on display at Montero Bar and Grill that no one realized it when a particularly cherished item went missing.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column details mystery surrounding disappearance of decorative life preserver from Montero Bar and Grill, Atlantic Avenue bar that resembles museum due to its collection of ephemera; owner Pepe Montero says life preserver was particularly cherished, made by a nephew in the 1990s; theft has galvanized Brooklyn bar's staff and patrons into a barroom Justice League.
lead_paragraph: There are so many model ships, vintage photographs and life preservers on display at Montero Bar and Grill that no one realized it when a particularly cherished item went missing.

headline.main: Brooklyn Bar Has a Piece of Its Past Stolen
headline.print_headline: Profile of a Modern Brooklyn Pirate: A Young, Male, Drunken Idiot
